Plot: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs.
Title: Kill Your Darlings
Writer: Austin Bunn (screenplay), Austin Bunn (story), John Krokidas (screenplay)
Actors: Daniel Radcliffe, Dane DeHaan, Michael C. Hall, Jack Huston
tomatoConsensus: Bolstered by the tremendous chemistry between Daniel Radcliffe and Dane DeHaan, Kill Your Darlings casts a vivid spotlight on an early chapter in the story of the Beat Generation.
